channel.title: 508 help
channel.description:
i own a server but i run auto restarter and my server keeps crashing too fast. like 2 minutes after restart it crashes and is there any ways to make it hold up longer? this is whats in runserver.bat
@echo off title Fathienblade 508 cls cd ../build echo Fathienblade is online! java -Xmx512m net/com/espeon/Server 43594 pause

item.title: 508 help
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:

i own a server but i run auto restarter and my server keeps crashing too fast. like 2 minutes after restart it crashes and is there any ways to make it hold up longer?
this is whats in runserver.bat
